sqlMap.select: select count(*) from member where id =#userid#

select count(*) from member where id =#userid# and pass=#userpass# and pass=#passcheck# and name=#username# and name=#gender1# and name=#gender2# and name=#year# and name=#month# and name=#day# and name=#mail1# and name=#mail2# and name=#cell# and name=#cell1# and name=#cell2#
